channel.title: London Eye on Martin's Blog 3
channel.description: Recent content in London Eye on Martin's Blog 3

item.title: London visit - day 4 of 4
item.description: [caption id=“attachment_1453” align=“aligncenter” width=“720”] A shark in the big tank in the London Aquarium[/caption] Not feeling very well in the morning of the last day, this cold has been getting the better of me and running around London does not help it getting any better. Drugging-up with anti-inflammatories not helped either. [caption id=“attachment_1454” align=“alignright” width=“225”] The London Eye - close to the top[/caption] First port of call was the London eye I booked the previous day on-line.
